#summary Toolchain installation overview.

= Introduction =

This chapter describes how to setup necessary tools which you will need to
develop Embox.
This section is in no way trying to impose on you the proposed tools, you are
free to enjoy a more comfortable and familiar (e.g. *Emacs*, *Vim*).

= Contents =

== <img align="left" src="http://embox.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/cygwin_small.png" /> [InstallToolchainWindowsCygwin Windows-specific setup] ==

Windows user have to perform some additional steps to get things work. This
article covers the installation procedure of *Cygwin* Unix-compatibility layer.

== <img align="left" src="http://embox.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/console_small.png" /> [InstallToolchainPath PATH environment variable] ==

Describes how to set *`PATH`* environment variable in both Windows and Linux systems.

== <img align="left" src="http://embox.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/eclipse_small.png" /> [InstallToolchainEclipse Eclipse] ==

Installing and tweaking *Eclipse IDE* with *CDT* plugin.

== <img align="left" src="http://embox.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/svn_small.png" /> [InstallToolchainSubversion Subversion] ==

Installing *Subclipse* SVN plugin for Eclipse and checking out Embox from
repository.
